revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=E1000 |revision=v1 |fcc_date=12/29/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-E1000 |ic_id=3839A-E1000 |pcb_id=3763-01010105R |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4716B0;BCM4716B0KFBG, CA1022 P20, 977375 N1; |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3205DM2I-12G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622FTP-D43 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP12 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4716B0;BCM4716B0KFBG, CA1022 P20, 977375 N1; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG, RG1021 P11, 977568 1A; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2528L;SiGe, 2528L, 850CM;2; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, TomatoUSB, OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=CiscoXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Cisco[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_pass=admin |oui=68:7F:74, C0:C1:C0 |oui_eth=68:7F:74, C0:C1:C0 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=E1000}}
"3763-01010105R" is silkscreened on the board of some / all production model units. :E1000 v1 serial numbers appear to start with '''CVN0'''.
The default SSID is '''CiscoXXXXX''' where '''XXXXX''' is the last 5 digits of the serial number. :If the device has been configured with Cisco Connect the device will probably :have a [[Cisco Connect SSIDs|randomly generated SSID]]. A sample serial number is CVN01K6E1346.
===Links=== *{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_E1000_v1}} *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/linksys/e1000 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=79673 On '''DD-WRT''' forums] w/ OUI mention *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_E1000 On '''DD-WRT''' wiki] w/ serial pinout
